summary: The Middle Mile for Rural America Act aims to expand middle mile infrastructure into rural areas. It amends Section 602(g) of the Rural Electrification Act of 1936 to extend the timeframe for this infrastructure expansion from 2018-2023 to 2026-2031. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives by Mr. Feenstra and others and was referred to the Committee on Agriculture and the Committee on Energy and Commerce.
